name: Blink
requirements:
Any Attunement
Trigger: You are hit by an Attack or a Spell
effect:
Make a Willpower roll. If your roll is higher than the attack roll that hit you, you dodge the attack - the attack misses you.
If you dodge, you can immediately move 1+WIL squares - this movement does not provoke Opportunity Attacks, and you can cross squares occupied by enemies (but you cannot end your movement there).

name: Blurred Step
effect:
You can move 2+WIL squares - this movement does not provoke Opportunity Attacks, and you can cross squares occupied by enemies (but you cannot end your movement there).
At the end of the movement, you gain Vigor.

name: Crystal Prison
effect:
HIT - Make an opposed Willpower roll against the target. If your roll is higher, until you mantain the upkeep, the target can't perform any actions during its turn.
If the target is attacked and/or damaged, the spell breaks and you recover your upkeep.

name: Elemental Bolt
effect:
HIT - [Spell] Fire or Frost damage (according to your attunement).
DAMAGE - According to your attunement: Fire: Inflicts Burning, Frost: Inflicts Crippled.

name: Elemental Weapon
effect:
Your Melee Weapon becomes infused with Fire or Frost energy (according to your attunement).
Whenever you make a Melee Attack with the infused weapon, on damage you also inflict Burning (Fire) or Crippled (Frost).

name: Elemental Barrier
effect:
Whenever you are hit by a Melee Attack, the attacker is Crippled (Frost) or is Burning (Fire).
In addition, if you are not wearing any armor, your Armor is increased by 2.

name: Ethereal Armor
effect:
When you cast Ethereal Armor, put 6 tokens on it. When you lose a Wound, you remove a token instead.
When the last token is removed, the  make a WIL roll against the MASS of all creatures adjacent to you. On success, the creature is pushed WIL squares.

name: Fireball
target: Creatures in a 3x3 area centered on a square in range 6
effect:
HIT - [Spell] Fire damage.
DAMAGE - The target is Burning.

name: Frost Shock
effect:
HIT - [Spell] Frost damage.
DAMAGE - Inflicts Crippled, and the target is Stunned.

name: Ice Blast
target: Creatures in a 3x3 area adjacent to you
effect:
HIT - [Spell] Frost damage.
DAMAGE - Inflicts Crippled.

name: Incinerate
requirements: Fire AttunementThe target must be Burning
effect:
HIT - [Spell] Fire damage.
DAMAGE - If the target is Injured after the inflicted damage, make a Willpower roll vs target's Toughness roll - if you win, the target is immediately Dying.

name: Purifying Flames
requirements: Fire AttunementThe target must be Burning
effect: HIT - [Spell] Fire damage, and you gain Regeneration. If you cast this spell in double attunement, you can spend all your remaining energy and recover the same amount of Wounds.
